fields.headline: Ugandan journalist raped and murdered
fields.bodyText: The International Federation of Journalists has called on the Ugandan government to investigate the murder of Ugandan journalist Rebecca Wilbrod Kasujja. She was was raped and killed by unknown men while on her way to work at at a community radio station, Buwama FM. Though the reason for her murder is unclear fellow journalists believe it was related to her journalistic work. (Via IFJ)
